content: How can I display the unread count only for the topics I follow? The unread count is usually in the thousands for me, because I don't use Zulip very often and almost never open some channels. That's not very helpful.
You can unsubscribe from those channels. That might help.
But I'm not sure if it's very customizable beyond that...

We've had some discussion about implementing this option, but were first trying to brainstorm a design that would give some visual indication that this is how your Zulip is configured.

Do folks think having a visual distinction would be important?
You can also mute those channels, and unmute the topics you care about in them.
For instance, I have #general muted, so it doesn't show up in unreads, but if I unmute one topic with 11 unreads in it, my overall unreads show as 11 now.
